___destination.description: Properties of the destination of funds.

___address.description: An address representing the destination of the transaction.

___amount.description: The amount to be received by the receiver (`value` may be ommitted if a source amount is specified).

___source.description: Properties of the source of funds.

___currencies.description: An array of currencies (with optional counterparty) that may be used in the payment paths.

___counterparty.description: The counterparty for the currency; if omitted any counterparty may be used.

___address.description: The XRP Ledger address of the account where funds will come from.

___amount.description: The amount of funds to send.
